00001 #include "../../../graphics/effects/CVibrate.h"
00002 #include "../../spritedefines.h"
00003 #include "../../../sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00004 #include "../../../keen.h"
00005 #include "CVorticon.h"
00006 #include "CRope.h"

00008 // The rope holding the stone which kills the final Vorticon (ep1)
00009 #define STONE_WIDTH          9
00010 #define STONE_HEIGHT         2
00011 
00012 #define STONE_DROP_RATE      6
00013 
00014 CRope::CRope(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y) :
00015 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_ROPE)
00016 {
00017  state = ROPE_IDLE;
00018  canbezapped = 1;
00019  inhibitfall = true;
00020  sprite = OBJ_ROPE_DEFSPRITE;
00021  needinit = false;
00022  droptimer = 0;
00023 }
00024 
00025 void CRope::process()
00026 {
00027  switch(state)
00028  {
00029  case ROPE_DROPSTONE:
00030   if (!droptimer)
00031   {
00032    droptimer = STONE_DROP_RATE;
00033    rope_movestone();
00034    g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CVibrate(400));
00035 
00036    // check if we've hit the ground yet
00037    for(int x=2;x<STONE_WIDTH-2;x++)
00038    {
00039     if (falldist >= 4)
00040     {
00041      exists = false;
00042      return;
00043     }
00044    }
00045   }
00046   else droptimer--;
00047  default: break;
00048  }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void CRope::getShotByRay()
00052 {
00053  if(state == ROPE_IDLE)
00054  {
00055   if ( exists && canbezapped )
00056   {
00057    int x, y;
00058    // rope got broke! time to drop the stone
00059    state = ROPE_DROPSTONE;
00060    droptimer = 0;
00061    // hide the rope
00062    sprite = BLANKSPRITE;
00063    // get upper left corner of the stone
00064    x = getXPosition()>>CSF;
00065    y = getYPosition()>>CSF;
00066    stoneX = x - 4;
00067    stoneY = y + 1;
00068    // get color of background
00069    bgtile = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings().misc.changestoneblock;
00070    falldist = 0;
00071   }
00072  }
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 void CRope::rope_movestone()
00077 {
00078  int xa,ya;
00079 
00080  xa = stoneX;
00081  ya = stoneY;
00082 
00083  // move the stone down one space and kill anything in it's path!
00084  for(int y=STONE_HEIGHT;y>0;y--)
00085  {
00086   for(int x=0;x<STONE_WIDTH;x++)
00087   {
00088    mp_Map->setTile(x+xa,y+ya, mp_Map->at(x+xa, y+ya-1), true);
00089   }
00090  }
00091 
00092  // clear the space at the top
00093  for(int x=0;x<STONE_WIDTH;x++)
00094   mp_Map->setTile(x+xa,ya,bgtile, true);
00095 
00096  stoneY++;
00097  falldist++;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void CRope::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject)
00101 {
00102  if(state == ROPE_DROPSTONE && m_type==OBJ_ROPE)
00103  {
00104   const int xa = stoneX;
00105   const int ya = stoneY;
00106 
00107   // move the stone down one space and kill anything in it's path!
00108   for(int y=STONE_HEIGHT;y>0;y--)
00109   {
00110    for(int x=0;x<STONE_WIDTH;x++)
00111    {
00112     // if the stone hits any enemies, kill them
00113     kill_intersecting_tile(x+xa, y+ya, theObject);
00114    }
00115   }
00116  }
00117 }
